original_title: 『The Color From Beyond -彼方からの色彩-』「ショートホラーフィルムチャレンジ」【GEMSTONE】
overview: A Lovecraft inspired horror short film created for the 5th GEMSTONE's Creators Audition, a collaborative project between Toho Co., Ltd. and AlphaBoat in which Japanese filmmakers competed in a challenge to create short horror themed films.
title: The Color From Beyond 【GEMSTONE Horror Entry】
